name: Cake Maker - Pastry Simulator
description:
Ready to make creamy chocolate cake?
We welcome you to our creamy chocolate cake factory here in our cake making factory game.
We will be making yummy, delicious chocolate cakes with different toppings and cake frosting.
In this cake factory, we will also be making delicious wedding cakes and birthday cakes, we will be decorating with beautiful frosting decorations and icing.
Create cakes like in the old good days! Become the best pastry chef ever! 3 different difficulty and lots of levels are waiting for you.
We are hope you will love this game and rate it. We are open for your feedback and will be glad to hear your ideas.

Good luck, have fun!
